comment.body: It's also available on KopyKate now: [Getting a Bit Batty](/big.kopykate.bit/?Video=1582467905_1BFC6WPRFTMXJzb687o2bvFhgt3HLci1v7)
There's a Metokur stream coming up titled "Dipmageddon". What could it be about?

Journalists and Democrat politicians were complaining travel bans were racist and saying "it's just a flu bro, keep going to the cinema" right up to the point where it was undeniably a worldwide threat. So the hypocrisy of these same people now shouting "hurr durr, orange man bad, why didn't daddy oppress me more" is rather funny.

Trump did fuck it up though, lol.

Correction: Millie Weaver was arrested 2 hours before the scheduled release of her documentary while the documentary was still uploading to Youtube. A friend who she'd given a copy prior uploaded the documentary while she was in custody. Her husband was arrested as well. Youtube and Facebook are actively taking down the videos. Twitter has blocked #ShadowGate and related searches as well as marking links to the video as "potentially harmful". They have charged her with robbery, tampering with evidence, obstructing justice, and domestic violence, it is not clear whether these charges are related to the production of the documentary but friends believe they are innocent and these charges were brought in an attempt to silence her.
You probably want to change the link to [/big.kopykate.bit/?Video=1597462533_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC](/big.kopykate.bit/?Video=1597462533_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC)
